name: Keep It Aflame
description:
In this unbalanced Tower Defense, protect your master campfire from evil boat-riding fire extinguishers with your little campfires.

Be careful, your FIYA POWA (the only resource of the game) diminishes over time and when you place towers.

Controls:
- Hold Tab to display towers stats
- Left Click to place a regular tower
- Shift + Left Click to place a more powerful tower
